Name: Het Boemeltje
Review Text: (Translated by Google) A cafe in the center of Almere where you still get that feeling of old Amsterdam with cosiness and homely warmth. They also serve top dishes with sometimes a Surinamese twist. An absolute must ‚Ä¶

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Always cosy. A drink after shopping, grabbing a terrace (sun in the summer, winter heaters and blankets) or an evening of music inside. Drinks are fine. There is also a card for lunch and dinner. Mixed audience. ‚Ä¶
